result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Todd S. Grossklaus

records.addlTxt: Status conference on November 28, 2022 at 08:15 am.
Pre-trial conference on October 18, 2022 at 11:30 am.
for Examination under 971.16 Wis. Stats

8:15 AM Court calls case, cites appearances.  Judge McKnight and CR appear from Ashland by Zoom.  Defendant Todd S. Grossklaus in court.  Attorney Daniel W Johns Jr in court for Todd S. Grossklaus.  Attorney Matthew J Tingstad in court for State of Wisconsin.  Info rcvd, def waives reading per Atty Johns.  Def enters NG to 1-7 and a NG by MD or Defect for Counts 1-6.  Court orders an examination of def.  Exam to be done by WI Forensic Unit.  Clerk and JA to work together.  Case to be set for STC.  Court's expert.  11/28 at 8:15 a.m. for STC.  Nothing from State at this time.  10/18, parties having PTC per Atty John.  Court not scheduling as between parties.  Adj.  8:22 a.m.  klr
Transcript of Preliminary Hearing, August 29, 2022
Arraignment on October 3, 2022 at 08:15 am.

8:22 a.m.  Court calls case, cites appearances.  Judge McKnight appears via Zoom from Ashland County with CR.  Defendant Todd S. Grossklaus in court.  Attorney Daniel W Johns Jr in court for Todd S. Grossklaus.  Attorney Matthew J Tingstad in court for State of Wisconsin.  Continued preliminary.  Court reviewed transcript.  Addresses parties.  Court finds PC and binds def over for trial.  ARGN scheduled for October 3, 2022 at 8:15 a.m.  Adj.  8:27 a.m.  klr
Preliminary hearing on August 29, 2022 at 08:15 am.
of Preliminary Hearing held on 8/9/2022
W/EXH. A

9:01 a.m.  Court calls case, cites appearances.  Judge McKnight appears with CR via Zoom from Ashland County.  Attorney Daniel W. Johns, Jr. appears with def in Iron County.  Matthew J. Tingstad appears for the State of WI, with Deputy Corey Mass in Iron County.  Deputy Mass sworn in, direct by DA.  Officer shown picture of Exhibit #1 (previously also marked).  Identifies picture of 1 shotgun, 1 pistol, weapons from struggle with def.  9:20 a.m.  Cross by Atty Johns.  9:39 a.m.  Per Court:  "Discovery process over."  To continue.  9:41 a.m.  Redirect by DA.  9:41 a.m.  Recross.  Exhibit #1, marked, offered, received.  DA makes final argument for bindover on Count #1..  Atty Johns moves for dismissal.  9:47 a.m.  Court clarifies a few items for parties.  Court is ordering transcript of hearing for own review.  Continuing hearing to 8/29 at 8:15 a.m.  Adj.  9:51 a.m.  klr
for Preliminary Hearing
Preliminary hearing on August 9, 2022 at 09:00 am.

records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt: 08:15 AM Defendant Todd S. Grossklaus in court with attorney Daniel W Johns.  Matthew J Tingstad appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court calls case, cites appearances.  Court appears remotely via Zoom.  Copy of complaint recvd by def, waives reading.  Def waives T/L for prelim.  Def agrees to waive time limit.  No coercion to waive time limits.  Court satisfied def waiver is made freely, knowingly, and intelligently.  Court schedules prelim.  DA requests 2 weeks out and to have 1 1/2 hrs for proceeding.  Prelim scheduled for 8/9 and defense agrees can be held via Zoom (court).  Court asks court to file Exhibits as proposed Exhibits (individually and as proposed) State gets 1-100 and Def gets 101-200.  8/9 at 9:00 a.m. for prelim.  Set for 1 1/2 hrs.  Nothing further.  Adj.  8:22 a.m.  klr
Initial appearance on June 20, 2022 at 08:15 am.

records.descr: Application for specific judicial assign approved

records.addlTxt: No contact with victim(s).  No alcohol or controlled substances and not to be present at establishments that serve alcohol.  Def shall not possess guns or weapons of any kind.  Def shall submit to on-demand testing by law enforcement.  Def cannot leave Gogebic/Iron Counties except to go to Sawyer or Ashland Counties for medical appointments.  Def must have have proof of appointment on his person.
Initial appearance on May 2, 2022 at 09:00 am.

01:28 PM Defendant Todd S. Grossklaus in court, in custody.  Matthew J Tingstad appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court calls case, cites appearances.  Def filed petition for court-appointed atty.  Denied PD representation.  Court explains process for court-appointed atty.  Court questions def re assets/income.  Court swears in def.  Questions further.  Court finds def qualifies for court-appointed atty.  Court reads charges.  DA requests testing on demand and requests $100,000 ($80,000 more).  Def responds that he didn't show up yesterday because he didn't know had court.  Didn't see it on the bond doc.  States he was just at home.  Court clarifies on demand for alcohol testing.  Court doesn't increase cash bond.  Court already took into consideration events when setting bond.  Court does modify terms of bond to include def shall submit to on-demand testing by law enforcement.  Also includes cannot leave Gogebic/Iron except with proof of appointment of medical appt can go to Sawyer or Ashland Counties.  Initial appearance to be set on 5/2 at 9:00 a.m.  Court advises to contact the court if does not hear from us re atty.  Adj.  1:44 p.m.  klr  Initial appearance scheduled for May 2, 2022 at 09:00 am.

09:39 AM Defendant Todd S. Grossklaus not in court.  Matthew J Tingstad appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Case was set at last court hearing.  Summons and Complaint filed today.  Def posted $20,000 cash in case.  Has also filed Petition for Court Appointed Atty.  DA requests a warrant.  Body only authorized.  Victim is present in court today.  Adj.  9:40 a.m.  klr
for Appt. of Atty
to Modify Bond
to Modify Bond

03/21/22 BBH/PC HRG Minutes:  1:44 p.m.  Court calls case.  Def appears in person, in custody.  Identifies himself.  Matthew J. Tingstad appears for the State of WI.  PC Statement provided to Court.  Public def info given to def.  Court explains right to atty and process.  Jason Geach sworn in, direct by DA.  Direct by DA.  Court finds PC on all four allegations.  Bond to be decided.  Def understands.  DA requests $10,000 cash bond with conditions of no abusive contact with vic, no alcohol, no possession of guns.  No resonse from def.  Court questions DA.  Court sets $20,000 cash bond.  No contact with victim, no alcohol/CTs or presence at place that serves alcohol.  No possession of guns or weapons.  Def on disabiliity.  4/11 at 9:00 for Initial.  Court explains that Atty can revisit bond if motion filed.  Complaint to be filed forthwith.  Adj.
